name: 5 Pin Button Badge Pack: Fickle Forest *LOW STOCK*
description:
5 pack of 25mm badges with original artwork by Alison Erika Forde.  

1 x Wicked wolf
1 x Toadstools
1 x Big Black Bird
1 x Deer me
1 x Woodgrain

name: Cards
description:
*LOW STOCK*  Christmas cards for those looking for something a little different this festive season!

A6 folded cards on a heavy stock that has a sophisticated matte finish, each comes with an A6 Kraft envelope. The cards have blank insides ready for your own messages:

♥ Elf scamp - is he making with that sac of goodies? surely not!
♥ Christmas coal - If you've been bad this year!
♥ Polar bear - enjoying a candy cane a little too much!

           ________________________________________________________


4 A6 postcards featuring reproductions of original paintings by Alison Erika Forde with rounded finish corners:

♥ Wearing a frown - an obsessive Pierot fan
♥ Rabbit rolling - what kind of monster would play boules with bunnies?
♥ Feathers - pesky cat loves to torment rainbow feathered birds 
♥ Shiteye - one look can say it all

All limited edition. Printed in the UK.

name: A5 full colour zines
description:
PUTRID PAINTS ISSUE 1 is a 16 page full colour story zine about that one time The Moon ran away!  
Story by artist Seleena Laverne Daye and original artwork by Alison Erika Forde.

THE SLEEPING DEATH is a 12 page full colour picture zine. 
Inspired by Snow White's wicked Stepmother's potion, our sleeping state and bereavement. 
It is a compilation of themed original hand-painted images, reproduced to a high quality, to make a unique and interesting collectible keepsake!

name: Signed Limited edition 'tickle trap' A3 Giclée print
description:
'tickle trap' depicts big Burr gettin' tickle whooped, but danger lurks.  Any ticklish creature is VOLATILE.  Some black crows want in on the 'fun' and a few nosey parker voyeurs spy through the thick foliage.  

Exclusive Giclée print of an original painting by Alison Erika Forde.
Limited edition signed and numbered
Professionally printed on white 310 gsm Hahnemühle German Etching acid-free paper with archival inks
A3 size including a border for framing
Orders sent in boarded envelope

name: wearable art wood slice brooch
description:
High quality image of originally painted brooch design by Alison Erika Forde. 
High gloss finish on solid wood slice, locally sourced near my house! 
Printed, assembled and varnished by me at my studio in the UK!

Dimensions vary in thickness and diameter as these are hand cut objects.  Approx. 5 - 6 cm diameter by 0.7 cm depth

Each brooch comes in a 'Bears & burrs' hand-stamped presentation box

♥ cranky cat - scratching your favourite record
♥ full Moon - gobbled up all but the legs
♥ hypnotic - mesmerised and entranced
